changes.change: This update comes with the following icons, Phone, Settings, Safari, Contacts, Stocks, YouTube (The one that comes with iOS), Game Center. Planned for next update: Change the video icon to Apple TV icon, add the rest of the icons, and fix the music icon.
This update brings full coverage of all stock iOS 4 apps, and proper icon masking.
More fixes, and modern Yahoo! icons in the Weather app.
